markdownRemark.html: Only three kilometers from the N340 and the A7 toll road at Calahonda, Miraflores is situated in the very heart of the Costa del Sol's many golf courses. A beautiful course with stunning views. Very demanding, but a standard level for the 15 and below DVD for the disabled. A buggy is recommended since it is very mountainous.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf Miraflores
frontmatter.description: Club de Golf Miraflores -  Only three kilometers from the N340 and the A7 toll road at Calahonda, Miraflores is situated in the very heart of the Costa del Sol's many golf courses. A beautiful course with stunning views. Very demanding, but a standard level for the 15 and below DVD for the disabled. A buggy is recommended since it is very mountainous.
frontmatter.address: Crtra. de Cádiz km. 199, Urb. Riviera del Sol, Mijas Costa, 29647 Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 68.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 68.00 euros
